alert.note: Alert for Anson; Hoke; Montgomery; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 11:31PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Moore, north central Scotland, east central Anson, southeastern Montgomery, Richmond and west central Hoke Counties through 1230 AM EST... At 1129 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Rockingham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Rockingham, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Pinebluff, Ellerbe, Foxfire, Taylortown and Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways
